Title: Makes permanent provisions creating a presumption relating to certain lung disabilities incurred by volunteer firefighters
Summary: Makes permanent provisions creating a presumption relating to certain lung disabilities incurred by volunteer firefighters.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 606 of the laws of 2006, amending the volunteer firefighters' benefit law, relating to creating a presumption relating to certain lung disabilities incurred by volunteer firefighters, in relation to making such provisions permanent
